mapper.select: SELECT level FROM `tb_sys_menu` where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 1
SELECT max(sort) FROM `tb_sys_menu` where parent_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND `status` = '1' LIMIT 1

select t.id, t.menu_name, t.menu_url, t.sort, t.parent_id, t.create_time, t.is_dir, tt.id as resourceId, tt.resources_name, tt.resources_url, tt.menu_id, tt.create_time as createTime, tt.status from tb_sys_menu t LEFT JOIN (select id, resources_name, resources_url, menu_id, create_time, `status` from tb_sys_resources where `status` = '1') tt on t.id = tt.menu_id where t.`level` = '1' and t.`status` = '1' ORDER BY t.`sort` ASC,tt.create_time DESC

SELECT t.parentName, t.id, t.menu_name, t.menu_url, t.sort, t.parent_id, t.create_time, t.is_dir, tt.id as resourceId, tt.resources_name, tt.resources_url, tt.menu_id, tt.create_time as createTime, tt.status FROM (SELECT DISTINCT t2.menu_name as parentName, t1.id, t1.menu_name, t1.menu_url, t1.sort, t1.parent_id, t1.create_time, t1.is_dir FROM tb_sys_menu t1 INNER JOIN tb_sys_menu t2 on t1.parent_id = t2.id where t1.`status` = '1' and t2.`status` = '1' and t1.parent_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) t LEFT JOIN (select id, resources_name, resources_url, menu_id, create_time, `status` from tb_sys_resources where `status` = '1') tt on t.id = tt.menu_id ORDER BY t.`sort` ASC , tt.create_time DESC
select id, menu_name as label, menu_url as menuUrl, sort, parent_id as parentId, create_time as createTime, is_dir as isDir from tb_sys_menu where `level` = '1' and `status` = '1' ORDER BY sort ASC

select t.menu_name as parentName, tt.id, tt.menu_name as `label`, tt.menu_url as menuUrl, tt.sort, tt.parent_id as parentId, tt.create_time as createTime, tt.is_dir as isDir from tb_sys_menu t, (select id, menu_name, menu_url, sort, parent_id, create_time, is_dir from tb_sys_menu where parent_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and `status` = '1') tt where t.id = tt.parent_id and `status` = '1' ORDER BY tt.sort ASC

SELECT t.id, t.menu_name as label, t.menu_url as menuUrl, (select menu_name from tb_sys_menu where id = t.parent_id and `status` = '1') as parentName, t.parent_id as parentId, t.is_dir as isDir, t.create_time as createTime, t.sort FROM `tb_sys_menu` t where t.parent_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.`status` = '1' ORDER BY t.`sort` ASC
